channel.title: Sick on KrolTech
channel.description: Recent content in Sick on KrolTech

item.title: Borderlands 2!!!
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: Big item this week was Borderlands 2!!! Took the day off and raged all day with some friends. Was a great time and had a blast! Game is awesome and if you loved 1 you will love 2 (not much surprising there). Got sick later in the week and have just been feeling miserable. Going a little crazy at work as nothing seems to be working correctly.
